Title: III.
Plot: While Flint and Gates realise they need help to find the Urca d'Lima, John and Billy have to increase the crew's morale. Vane impresses Eleanor and Gates receives a promotion.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jeremy Crutchley, Patrick Lyster, Lawrence Joffe, Jannes Eiselen, Mark Elderkin, Neels Clasen, Quentin Krog
